workflow.name: Remove video background & compose on custom video background with Google Drive
workflow.description:
## How it works

‚Ä¢ Upload foreground video (AI actors, product demos, webcam footage)
‚Ä¢ Provide custom background video URL
‚Ä¢ API removes video background with videobgremover.com
‚Ä¢ Composites foreground onto background
‚Ä¢ Downloads and uploads to Google Drive
‚Ä¢ Returns shareable link

## Set up steps

‚Ä¢ Get API key at https://videobgremover.com/n8n (2 min)
‚Ä¢ Import workflow (1 min)
‚Ä¢ Add API key to n8n variables as VIDEOBGREMOVER_KEY (1 min)
‚Ä¢ Connect Google Drive (2 min)
‚Ä¢ Test with manual trigger (1 min)
‚Ä¢ Total: 7 minutes

## What you'll need

‚Ä¢ VideoBGRemover API key ($0.50-$2.00 per minute)
‚Ä¢ Google Drive account
‚Ä¢ Publicly accessible video URLs
‚Ä¢ n8n instance

## Perfect for

‚Ä¢ AI UGC ad creators using HeyGen, Synthesia, Arcads
‚Ä¢ Marketing agencies creating ad variations
‚Ä¢ E-commerce product demos on custom backgrounds
‚Ä¢ Social media content with branded scenes
‚Ä¢ Video editors removing backgrounds at scale

## Key features

‚Ä¢ Video composition with custom templates
‚Ä¢ Audio mixing with adjustable volumes
‚Ä¢ 20-second polling for status
‚Ä¢ Google Drive integration
‚Ä¢ Webhook automation support
‚Ä¢ 3-5 minute processing time per minutes of input video

workflow.name: Remove Video Background & Compose on Custom Background with Google Drive

parameters.content:
## üé¨ Video Background Removal & Composition

**What it does:**
- Removes background from ANY video (AI actors, product demos, webcam footage, etc.)
- Composites foreground onto custom background video
- Mixes audio from both videos
- Saves final result to Google Drive

**Perfect for:**
- AI UGC ad creators (HeyGen, Synthesia, D-ID)
- E-commerce product videos with branded backgrounds
- Social media content with custom scenes
- Webcam/talking head videos on professional backgrounds
- Sports training videos with clean backgrounds

**Processing time:** 3-5 minutes per minute of video

**Setup:** ~7 minutes total

[üìñ Full Documentation](https://docs.videobgremover.com/)

## üîë API Key Setup (Required)

**Step 1:** Get your API key
- Visit: https://videobgremover.com/api-management
- Sign up (free tier available)
- Copy your API key

**Step 2:** Add to n8n environment variables
- Go to: Settings ‚Üí Variables
- Add new variable:
  - Name: `VIDEOBGREMOVER_KEY`
  - Value: your API key
- Save

**Pricing:** $0.50-$2.00 per minute processed

‚úÖ This workflow uses `$vars.VIDEOBGREMOVER_KEY` (secure)

## üì• Input Videos Required

**Foreground video:** Subject with any background
- AI actors (HeyGen, Synthesia, D-ID)
- Product demonstrations
- Webcam/talking head footage
- Sports/training content

**Background video:** Your custom scene
- Brand environments
- Stock footage
- Custom locations
- Animated backgrounds

‚ö†Ô∏è Both must be **publicly accessible URLs**

## üé® Composition Template

**Template:** `ai_ugc_ad`
- Positions foreground in bottom-right corner
- 35% of canvas size
- Slight transparency for polish (95% opacity)
- Perfect for AI avatars over product backgrounds

**Audio mixing:**
- Background audio: 30% volume
- Foreground audio: 100% volume
- Smooth audio blending

**Export:**
- Format: H.264 (MP4)
- Preset: Medium (balanced quality/speed)

*Customize these in the "Start Composition" node*

## üîÑ Processing & Polling

**How it works:**
1. Job submitted to API
2. Background removal starts (20-60 sec)
3. Composition applied
4. Status checked every 20 seconds
5. When complete ‚Üí download & upload

**Status flow:**
- `processing` ‚Üí Wait 20s ‚Üí Check again
- `completed` ‚Üí Download video
- `failed` ‚Üí Return error details

‚è±Ô∏è Typical: 3-5 min per min of video

## üíæ Google Drive Setup

**Step 1:** Connect Google Drive
- Click "Upload to Google Drive" node
- Click "Connect"
- Authorize n8n

**Step 2:** Choose folder (optional)
- Default: Root of "My Drive"
- Or select specific folder

**Output:**
- Permanent shareable link
- Direct download URL
- File metadata

‚è±Ô∏è Setup time: ~2 minutes

## üöÄ How to Use

**Manual testing:**
1. Update video URLs in "Sample Inputs (manual)"
2. Click "Execute Workflow"
3. Wait for processing (3-5 min per min of video)
4. Check Google Drive for result

**Webhook automation:**
1. Activate workflow
2. Copy webhook URL
3. POST to webhook:
```json
{
  "foreground_video_url": "https://...",
  "background_video_url": "https://..."
}
```

**Batch processing:** Connect to Google Sheets or Airtable for bulk automation

assignments.name: final_result
assignments.value:
={{ {
  success: true,
  job_id: $('1. Create Job (Upload Foreground)').item.json.id,
  export_id: $('2. Start Composition').item.json.export_id,
  google_drive_id: $json.id,
  google_drive_url: $json.webViewLink,
  download_url: $('3. Check Job Status').item.json.processed_video_url,
  message: 'Video composed successfully and saved to Google Drive',
  filename: $json.name,
  video_length_seconds: $('3. Check Job Status').item.json.length_seconds,
  source: $('Merge Triggers').item.json.source
} }}

assignments.name: final_result

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
